name: FUTURA90
description:
Story :

You are a genius in 1990, you are the first person to create a spatiotemporal portal.

One day you decide to go through until 2090, when you arrive the portal explodes, you have to rebuild it.

Will you be able to do it as soon as possible, will you dream of your wife and 2 children?

To find out, play FUTURA90!

Made by Gabin, Théo and Arthur.
